services.headline: Complete care from quick fixes to complex repairs
services.description: We combine experienced technicians, modern diagnostics and transparent communication. Choose from clear service packages or ask for a tailored plan.
services.helper: Pick the service you need to see all details.

items.title: Oil change
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Fast engine oil replacement, new filter and a basic fluid check according to the manufacturer guidance.

items.title: Brake discs and pads replacement
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Precise replacement of discs and pads including cleaning of contact surfaces and brake system bleeding.

items.title: Transmission oil change
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Complete exchange of transmission oil, leak inspection and shifting diagnostics for smooth operation.

items.title: Tyre service
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Tyre fitting and balancing, puncture repairs and seasonal tyre change with optional storage.

items.title: Wheel alignment
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Laser adjustment of toe and camber for stable handling and even tyre wear.

items.title: A/C service
items.subtitle: Regular maintenance
items.description: Air conditioning diagnostics, refrigerant refill and system disinfection for a healthy cabin climate.

items.title: Diagnostics
items.subtitle: When something fails
items.description: Advanced control unit diagnostics with live data reading and a clear repair plan.

items.title: Mechanical repairs
items.subtitle: When something fails
items.description: Repairs of suspension, engine and exhaust components using quality parts and guaranteed workmanship.

items.title: Engine overhauls
items.subtitle: When something fails
items.description: Complete engine rebuilds including measuring tolerances, machining parts and controlled break-in after assembly.

items.title: Bodywork
items.subtitle: Accident or vandal?
items.description: Chassis straightening, panel replacement and paint preparation at factory-level quality.

items.title: Windscreen replacement
items.subtitle: Accident or vandal?
items.description: Quick replacement of front, side and rear glass with calibration of cameras and assistance systems.

items.title: Panel painting
items.subtitle: Accident or vandal?
items.description: Professional painting of individual panels or whole bodies in a dust-free booth with accurate colour mixing.

items.title: Technical inspection (MOT)
items.subtitle: Checks and inspections
items.description: Preparation for technical inspection, arranging emissions tests and resolving any findings promptly.

items.title: Seasonal vehicle check
items.subtitle: Checks and inspections
items.description: Comprehensive checklist of fluids, brakes, suspension and electrics to keep the car ready for the season.

items.title: Pre-purchase inspection
items.subtitle: Checks and inspections
items.description: Detailed examination of a used vehicle on a lift, diagnostics and photo documentation for a confident purchase.

items.title: Suspension vibration test
items.subtitle: Additional services
items.description: Vibration testing reveals play in dampers, bushings and bearings and provides a clear measurement report.

items.title: Fleet service
items.subtitle: Additional services
items.description: Fleet maintenance with contracted pricing, cost reporting and pick-up or delivery options.

items.title: Convertible roof repair
items.subtitle: Additional services
items.description: Specialised repairs of fabric and hardtop convertible roofs, mechanism adjustment and surface treatment.

items.title: Manual gearbox oil change
items.subtitle: Additional services
items.description: Flushing and replacing oil in manual gearboxes, including checking synchronisers and cover seals.

items.title: A/C recharge
items.subtitle: Additional services
items.description: Air conditioning refill with precise refrigerant dosing, system vacuuming and leak pressure testing.

serviceDetail.notFoundDescription: The requested service offer could not be found.

hero.badge: Complete care for personal and fleet vehicles
hero.heading: EURO MOTORS – reliable care for your car in Prague
hero.description: Precise service, transparent communication and maximum focus on safety. We handle regular maintenance, complex repairs and MOT preparation.

address.label: Edisonova 8, Prague 10
address.description: Easy parking and EV charging on-site

about.heading: Committed to quality, fair pricing and personal service
about.description: EURO MOTORS is a family-run workshop built on open communication and long-term customer relationships. We handle every job individually and only recommend what truly benefits the condition of the vehicle.
about.quote: "Our goal is for every customer to leave feeling safe and confident."

quality.heading: Transparent repair process and premium customer care
quality.description: You are informed about every stage of the repair. We share photos, explain procedures and recommend sustainable solutions for a long vehicle lifespan.
quality.cardDescription: A simple process that respects your time.

steps.contact: Call us or fill in the contact form and we will schedule a visit.
steps.diagnostics: A technician runs diagnostics and we agree the scope of work together.
steps.handover: After the service we hand over the car clean and ready to drive.

faq.heading: Answers that help before you visit the workshop
faq.description: If you cannot find the answer, call or email us and we will be happy to help.

afterHours.question: Can I arrange a visit outside opening hours?
afterHours.answer: Give us a call and we will do our best to accommodate you even outside the standard schedule. We will agree a specific time together.

quoteEstimate.question: How do you calculate the repair price?
quoteEstimate.answer: We start with diagnostics and prepare a cost estimate covering parts and labour. You are informed about every change in advance and approve it.

replacementCar.question: Do you provide a replacement vehicle?
replacementCar.answer: For selected repair types we offer short-term replacement cars. We will check availability while booking.

ownParts.question: Can I bring my own spare parts?
ownParts.answer: We work with verified components so we can guarantee quality and warranty. For that reason we do not install customer-supplied parts.

contact.heading: We are ready to take care of your vehicle
contact.description: Book by phone or use the online form. We will help you choose the right service and prepare a non-binding quote.

unknown.label: Operating mode
unknown.detail: Opening hours will be confirmed soon.

hero.title: Get in touch
hero.intro: Need to reach us? Choose the channel that suits you best.

phones.title: Contact numbers
phones.description: Call us to book a service visit or discuss repairs.

bodyshop.title: Paint shop | Body shop | Detailing
bodyshop.description: Bodywork repairs, refinishing and detailing care.

details.title: Contact details
details.description: Address, email and social channels in one place.

hours.title: Opening hours
hours.description: By prior arrangement we will try to assist you outside standard hours as well.

weekdays.label: Monday - Friday
weekdays.note: Contact us in advance to arrange an individual time if needed.

weekend.label: Saturday & Sunday
weekend.note: Call us and we will look for an individual arrangement if urgent.

registration.label: Company registration
registration.value: File C 321387 kept at the Municipal Court in Prague

hero.title: About the EURO MOTORS workshop
hero.description: Get to know the values that shape our service philosophy. We live the idea of "Thinking together" in every repair we deliver.

introduction.title: Thinking together
introduction.subtitle: Every booking is a sign of trust that we want to honour.

paragraphs.mission: Allow us to introduce our workshop and the mindset that defines it. The EURO MOTORS motto "Thinking together" means we always look for the option that truly benefits you.
paragraphs.approach: We approach every job as a personal commitment. We listen, explain each step and recommend the solution that best matches your budget and the needs of your car.
paragraphs.team: Maximum quality, fair pricing and short turnaround times are goals shared by the whole team. From the mechanics to the warehouse and management, everyone focuses fully on your vehicle.

values.title: Values we put into practice
values.description: What you can rely on whenever you visit EURO MOTORS.

partnership.title: Partnership with every customer
partnership.description: Trust and openness guide the way we communicate. We share information transparently and only recommend what genuinely makes sense.

craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship and accountability
craftsmanship.description: Qualified technicians, proven parts and a willingness to stand behind our work are the cornerstones of each service.

transparency.title: Transparent communication
transparency.description: You always know what will happen and how much it will cost. There are no hidden extras or last-minute surprises.

care.title: Comfort throughout the service
care.description: Additional services designed to save you time and hassle.

replacementCar.title: Replacement vehicle
replacementCar.description: Depending on the job we can provide a short-term loaner so you can stay mobile.

pickup.title: Pick-up & drop-off
pickup.description: We collect your car, carry out the repair and bring it back ready to drive.

detailing.title: Finishing touch detailing
detailing.description: Once the work is complete, we return the car clean so the handover feels special.

commitments.title: What we guarantee
commitments.description: Reliability matters, which is why we keep our promises.

communication.title: Ongoing communication
communication.description: We keep you informed via phone or email as the job progresses.

documentation.title: Documentation and approvals
documentation.description: We share photos and recommendations, and obtain approval before any change.

deadlines.title: Agreed timelines respected
deadlines.description: We plan efficiently so the vehicle is ready at the time we commit to.

cta.title: Would you like to know more?
cta.description: Get in touch and let’s discuss how we can help.

cta.title: Interested in joining us?

hero.title: Privacy policy
hero.description: We explain how we process personal data of customers, prospects and visitors in a transparent way.

introduction.title: I. Introductory provisions
introduction.body:
The data controller is euromotors corporation s.r.o., ID 08580405, registered office V Pitkovičkách 351, 104 00 Prague 10, entered in the Commercial Register maintained by the Municipal Court in Prague, Section C, Insert 321387. The company acts as controller when processing data of customers, prospects and website visitors.

Personal data means any information that can identify an individual directly or indirectly – such as name, contact details, transaction information or device identifiers.

These principles describe what data we process, for which purposes, on what legal grounds and for how long. Whenever we refer to GDPR or Czech legislation, we follow their current wording.

purposes.title: II. Purposes and retention
purposes.body:
We only process personal data to the extent necessary to deliver our services and fulfil statutory duties. For each purpose we define a proportional retention period and respect the principle of data minimisation.

Most processing is based on contract performance, legitimate interest or legal obligation. For marketing outside that scope we request your consent, which can be withdrawn at any time.
purposes.list:
- fulfilling service orders and logistics, including invoicing
- communicating with clients, handling enquiries and claims
- meeting accounting and tax obligations
- operating and securing the website, analytics and cookies
- informing about services and news when consent has been granted

protection.title: III. Data protection measures
protection.body:
We implement technical and organisational measures to prevent unauthorised access, loss or misuse of data. Only trained personnel bound by confidentiality have access, and we rely on encrypted channels, access management, backups and regular reviews.

Data is processed both manually and automatically; however, we do not make decisions based solely on automated processing that would produce legal effects.

sharing.title: IV. Disclosure to third parties
sharing.body:
We share data only with trusted processors who support us with customer care, logistics, IT operations, accounting or legal services. Each processor works under contract, is bound by confidentiality and may use the data solely for the agreed purpose.

When required by law we may also provide data to public authorities.

rights.title: V. Data subject rights
rights.body: Anyone whose data we process can exercise the rights laid down in the GDPR. Requests can be sent to euromotorsofficial@gmail.com or mailed to the company address; we respond within 30 days and may ask for identity verification before handling the request.
rights.list:
- request confirmation whether we process your data and gain access to it
- ask for rectification of inaccurate or incomplete data
- demand erasure if the purpose expired or consent was withdrawn
- restrict processing, object to it, or withdraw consent
- obtain a copy of data in a structured format and request its transfer to another controller
- lodge a complaint with the Czech Data Protection Authority

conclusion.title: VI. Final provisions
conclusion.body:
All relations are governed by the laws of the Czech Republic. Contact us through the listed channels with any questions; the competent supervisory authority is the Office for Personal Data Protection (www.uoou.cz).

We review these principles regularly and publish the current version on our website.

cta.title: Need more details?
cta.description: Get in touch and we will gladly clarify how we handle personal data or how to exercise your rights.

hero.title: Transparent overview of service rates
hero.description: These rates provide a quick guide to our most common services. We will issue a precise quote after inspecting your vehicle.
hero.notePrimary: Prices cover labour only and exclude consumables or parts (oils, cleaners, components).
hero.noteSecondary: All amounts are indicative and listed without VAT. We will tailor an exact offer to your requirements.

services.note: Prices are indicative and exclude the cost of spare parts.
